jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Ensure that all GO-PAY users’ records (customers) remain current and compliant with standards 
● Meet weekly verification team performance goals not limited to: average lead time, average approval rate & quality rate ● Continuous capacity planning to be as efficient as possible while supporting the company’s demand and expansion, both on the electronic process and on-ground verification 
● Together with Product & Compliance team, refine all the existing processes to achieve company goals and ensure that user journey complies with country regulations at all times 
● Work closely with Compliance team to ensure zero fraudulent KYC document submissions in the platform, whether by setting up SOPs to control or by giving feedback to Product Managers to make changes to the product 
● Work closely with Legal team to do the continuous review and refine users’ T&C (customers/drivers) to ensure that all policies prevent money laundering, fake accounts, terrorism-funding within the GO-PAY ecosystem 
● Support the Customer Critical Incidents Team to improve the Enhanced Due Diligence procedure 
● Assess the risk from each customer based on their transactions by leveraging the internal tools, also reassess every time there is a change in the circumstances, and follow through with keeping up-to-date information on the customers based on the risk assessments

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Min Bachelor's Degree from any major from reputable University
  • 3+ years of working experience in a related field (KYC/ Know Your Customer), with min +/- in total experience 7 years
  • Preferably from FinTech, Banking or Insurance Industry
  • Having basic knowledge of Indonesian Banking Regulation is an advantage
  • Having leadership exposure
  • A thought-leader - creative ideation and intuition on relevant topics
  • A scientist - structured and data-driven thinking
  • A real problem solver - excited about improving things
